title: Bug 12398 Accessibility problems
description: When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not do anything unless I first click on one of the 'live' areas such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame.
OB: When launching the Help view, the tab key does not do anything.
EB: When launching the Help view, the tab key should be able to navigate through the elements without needing to click on 'live' areas first.
SR:
1. Launch the Help view.
2. Try using the tab key to navigate through the elements.
